thread.title: Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone

title: Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone
text:
> Sports Shero, Hynes era starts with Devils, Lamoriello gone New Jersey Devils' Jacob Josefson smiles after getting an assist on a goal by Tuomo Ruutu in the first period of a preseason NHL hockey game against the Philadelphia Flyers, Wednesday, Sept. 30, 2015, in Philadelphia. The Devils won 4-2. (AP Photo/Tom Mihalek)
